participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, Alex is always looking for new stories and adventures to dive into.
participant_1.background: I sometimes stay up late reading horror novels, which can mess up my sleep schedule. I grew up watching my mom make mashed potatoes, and I still love them to this day. I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn. My favorite movie is Titanic. My favorite drink is chocolate milk.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, Jordan enjoys expressing himself through his crafts and loves sharing his creations with others.
participant_2.background: I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands. I have a van that has a lot of room for my cooking supplies and equipment, and for when I'm traveling. I love Starbucks coffee. I am one of four children. I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.

content.text: Hi! I am a big fan of sci-fi space adventures and I would love to know what your favorites are.
Hi, I'm a big fan of creating beautiful things with my hands and I love Starbucks coffee.
That's really cool! What kind of things do you like to create?
I really enjoy making jewelry and I also like to bake a lot.
I love baking, too! What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love making chocolate chip cookies, especially when I can share them with my friends and family.
Chocolate chip cookies are my favorite, too! I love how they're so simple to make, but they always turn out delicious.
I know, right? They're the perfect dessert for any occasion.
I also love sci-fi space adventures. What are your favorite movies and TV shows in that genre?
I love Star Wars and Star Trek. I also really enjoy Doctor Who.
Those are all great choices! I love Star Wars and Doctor Who, too.
